title: Too zoomed in while in game?
body:
When my camera is at the very left bottom, I can barely see half of my nexus. My resolution on my pc is at 1980x1080 aswell as in game. I've always had this problem and changing my monnitor hasn't made a difference. I've tried everything I could find(no, scrolling up isn't working) any suggestions are helpful!
 
Thanks in advance
